QuestData.Title: Ruthless Cunning
QuestData.Description: <Lantresor hands you a pack full of banners.>$B$BThese are Warmaul ogre banners that I recently acquired.$B$BI want you to travel to Kil'sorrow Fortress, directly south of here, and kill as many of the Kil'sorrow filth as you can find. Drive a Warmaul ogre banner through the heart of each fallen Kil'sorrow soldier. Return to me when you have completed this task and the other that this plan requires.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lantresor of the Blade at the Burning Blade Ruins in Nagrand wants you to drive 10 Warmaul Ogre Banners through the bodies of Kil'sorrow members at Kil'sorrow Fortress.$B$BReturn any unused Warmaul Ogre Banners.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Lantresor's eyes open in bewilderment.>$B$BIs it done?
QuestData.RewardText: Can you imagine their puzzlement over what is happening, $r? This will be glorious.
